title: Life in hot wet lands: the Congo Basin
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Congo - Social life and customs
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Jungle ecology
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Vegetation and climate
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Family - Social aspects
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Human ecology
description: Set in the Congo Basin, this film illustrates how climate influences the lives of people who live in hot, wet lands. Follows the daily activities of a jungle boy and his family showing how they adapt their clothing, shelters, social activities and food gathering to the geographical region in which they live.
